qc_pca

Source: R/qc_pca.R
qc_pca.Rd

qc_pca

qc_pca(counts, n_comp = 10)

Arguments

counts

[data.frame] A data.frame with the count data.
n_comp

[numeric] Number indicating the number of principal components to compute. Cannot be more than n-1 samples. Default is 10.

Value

[list(data.frame)]

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
